title: Zac Efron's New Charity Event Has the Best Prize & It's For a Great Cause
title_page: Zac Efron's New Charity Event Has the Best Prize & It's For a Great Cause
text:
I gotta say, Zac Efron just keeps getting cooler and cooler with every passing day. Every time I read something new about him, even Michelle Rodriguez-related, I almost feel myself regarding him even more highly than before. Remember when he rappelled down a cliff on Running Wild With Bear Grylls ? Or when he majestically rode a horse on the beach? Yeah. Those were good days. This one is too: Apparently, Zac Efron has teamed up with Prizeo to support the Make-a-Wish foundation, and is participating in a charity event that will raise money for the organization as well as gift one lucky fan with his first car.
As Efron explained in a video for the event, fans can donate just $10 to have their name entered in the raffle, and whoever wins, no matter where in the world they are, they'll be flown to L.A., put up in a hotel room by Efron himself, and get a chance to "check out the car, take it for a test drive and hang out with me, too!" NOT a bad deal.
You can check out the video announcement for the event below, as well as Efron's Instagram post to promote it. If you want to enter (and I know I do!), head on over here to donate and support the cause. Every bit counts!
Prizeo on YouTube
Image: zacefron/Instagram
